thread.title: Watch: A Very Pregnant Natalie Portman in Stunning Black-and-White James Blake Video
thread.title_full: Watch: A Very Pregnant Natalie Portman in Stunning Black-and-White James Blake Video

author: Emily Buder
title: Watch: A Very Pregnant Natalie Portman in Stunning Black-and-White James Blake Video

persons.name: james blake video anna rose holme

text:
Watch: A Very Pregnant Natalie Portman in Stunning Black-and-White James Blake Video Anna Rose Holmer, director of 'The Fits,' shot James Blake's new music video. 
Natalie Portman is a big fan of James Blake. Perhaps that's why Portman agreed to star in the new music video for Blake's My Willing Heart just days before her daughter, Amalia, was born. 
Anna Rose Holmer lenses Portman in luscious black-and-white as the actress floats in water and lounges on her bed, feeling her baby kick. Holmer, who directed dance troupe indie hit The Fits and, most recently, shot that incredible Alvin Ailey Moonlight dance performance , clearly has a penchant for filming choreography; Portman moves in and out of the monochromatic light like a life-giving specter. 
Watch the video below.
